attributes.action: Make MP's and councillor's remuneration benefits more in step with their performance.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Recently, within East Lothian, government retirement remuneration benefits paid to Ms Moffat (MP) and Mr Lindsay (councillor) were perceived by most of the local electorate as being way out of step with what they would accept as being equitable. 

I think it would be timely for you, during this period of government financial stringency measures, to examine recent remuneration packages awarded, and to make sure that the system is not capable of being abused and that the awards are equitable.

rejection.details: Local Government pay and conditions in devolved in Scotland; pay and conditions for MPs is a matter for Parliament, not Government.
reasons: Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
